pos_mean_info_list.mean: 欺骗（impose的过去分词）；把…强加于
（建筑物等）壮观的；威风的；（仪表）堂堂的；给人深刻印象的
征收；强加；欺骗；不公平的负担

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指用各种不同方法向个人或单位征收所得税、房地产税等各种税款。侧重实际征收金钱。
指一般情况下，征收房地产税、罚款或其它费用。
指在决定个别案件中的处罚或罚款，尤指政府征收某种税收的决定。

word_group.brief_definition: 强加给；把…强加于；使硬缠着
制定规章制度；施加监管

bilingual.source: I don't want to impose my will on you.
bilingual.target: 我不想强加我的意愿给你。

bilingual.source: Do not impose your ideas on the children.
bilingual.target: 不要把你的想法强加给孩子。

bilingual.source: The government plans to impose new taxes next year.
bilingual.target: 政府计划明年强加新税。

bilingual.source: They should not impose these rules on us.
bilingual.target: 他们不应该把这些规则强加给我们。

bilingual.source: The government decided to impose new tax policies.
bilingual.target: 政府决定强加新的税收政策。

bilingual.source: It is unfair to impose your opinions on others.
bilingual.target: 把你的意见强加给别人是不公平的。

bilingual.source: He always tries to impose his opinions on others.
bilingual.target: 他总是试图把自己的意见强加给别人。

bilingual.source: The new law will impose severe penalties on offenders.
bilingual.target: 新法律将对违法者强加严厉的处罚。

bilingual.source: Parents should not impose their own beliefs on their children.
bilingual.target: 父母不应该把自己的信仰强加给孩子。

bilingual.source: The manager decided to impose strict rules to improve productivity.
bilingual.target: 经理决定强加严格的规定以提高生产力。

list.abstract: impose，英语单词，主要用作动词，作及物动词的意思是“强加；征税；以…欺骗”，作不及物动词的意思是“利用；欺骗；施加影响”。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Red, given the severity of the crimes, I have no choice but to impose the maximum penalty allowed by the law. Anger management class.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胖红先生，鉴于你的罪行性质恶劣，我只能从重发落，对你判处法律规定范围内最严重的刑罚，接受愤怒管理课程。

yingyinNormal.en: Fear of foreign competition once led countries to try and produce everything they needed and impose heavy taxes to keep out foreign goods.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对外国竞争感到的恐惧让一些国家决定自给自足，自行生产所有产品，并且向国外的商品收相当重的税。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, one who was drummed off the force because he refused to play by the rules, and now he hires himself out to impose his own brand of rough justice? No. Thank you, officer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是那种因为拒绝墨守陈规而被开除的警察，现在致力于用自己的残酷方式伸张正义。没有。多谢了，警官。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The cost of travelling by train rises, <highlight>imposing</highlight> a burden on those who have no option but to use the rail network to get to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 火车出行的成本上升，给那些别无选择只能使用铁路网上班的人带来了负担。

examination_example.sentence: British Land Art as shown in this exhibition wasn't about <highlight>imposing</highlight> on the landscape, more a kind of landscape-orientated light conceptual art created passing through.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这次展览中展示的英国地景艺术并不是要强加在景观上，更多的是一种以景观为导向的轻型概念艺术创作的经过。

examination_example.sentence: Yet rather than empowering teachers to find what works best for their students, the policy <highlight>imposes</highlight> a flat, across-the-board rule.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，该政策没有授权教师找到最适合他们学生的方法，而是强加了一个统一的、一刀切的规则。

examination_example.sentence: The French Senate passed a digital services tax, which would <highlight>impose</highlight> an entirely new tax on large multinationals that provide digital services to consumers or users.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国参议院通过了一项数字服务税，这将推行征收一项全新的税，征收对象是为消费者或用户提供数字服务的大型跨国公司。

examination_example.sentence: In order to ensure that elite women have more such opportunities, they have proposed <highlight>imposing</highlight> government quotas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了确保精英女性有更多这样的机会，他们提议推行政府配额。

examination_example.sentence: Financial regulators in Britain have <highlight>imposed</highlight> a rather unusual rule on the bosses of big banks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的金融监管机构对大银行的老板们实施了一项相当不寻常的规则。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 否定前缀, 表示"不, 无"

sample.mean: n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求
v. 使并列；把…置于近处
vt. 对照；针对；以 ... 针对着

word_usage.usage:
impose用作及物动词时，常与介词on或upon搭配，构成impose sth. on/upon sb./sth.，意思是“推行/采用（规章制度）”、“迫使；把……强加于”。例：
This system imposes additional financial burdens on many people.
这个制度给很多人增加了额外的经济负担。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 把(次品等)硬卖给; 以...欺骗

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 自加的；自愿承担的

word_family.mean: v. 把… 强加；利用；把…拼版；实施；要求履行；要求付；要求接受；对…施加严格控制

sense_info_list.en: require (a duty, charge, or penalty) to be undertaken or paid

examination_example.sentence_trans: 对超速驾驶处以更重的处罚。

examination_example.sentence: In France, the government has banned supermarkets from throwing away edible foods and <highlight>imposed</highlight> harsh penalties on businesses that fail to comply with the regulations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在法国，政府禁止超市扔掉可食用食品，并对不遵守规定的企业实施严厉处罚。

examination_example.sentence: With a tax <highlight>imposed</highlight> on expensive health insurance plans, most employers will likely transfer money from health expenses into wages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着对昂贵的医疗保险计划征税，大多数雇主可能会将医疗费用转移到工资中。

sense_info_list.en: force someone to accept something, especially a belief or way of living

examination_example.sentence: He carried out his self-<highlight>imposed</highlight> mission was fundamentally character-based.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他完成了自己强加的使命，这从根本上说是以性格为基础的。

examination_example.sentence: Self-<highlight>imposed</highlight> sleeplessness has "become a bit of a status symbol", says Taylor, a misguided measure to prove how powerful and productive you are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 泰勒说，自愿接受的失眠“在某种程度上已经成为一种地位的象征”，是一种被误导的方法，以证明你有多么强大和高效。

examination_example.sentence: What does Maryanne Taylor think of self-<highlight>imposed</highlight> sleeplessness?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玛丽安·泰勒如何看待自愿接受的失眠？

examination_example.sentence: Implicitly or explicitly, American fashion addressed a democracy, whereas traditional Paris-based fashion was prescriptive and <highlight>imposed</highlight> on women, willing or not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国时尚含蓄地或明白地表达民主，而基于巴黎的传统时尚是规定性的，是强加给女性的，无论是否愿意。

sense_info_list.en: force something unwelcome or unfamiliar to be accepted or put in place

examination_example.sentence: That is why government has historically intervened, banning advertising, <highlight>imposing</highlight> health warnings and punitive (惩罚性的) duties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么政府历来干预，禁止广告，施加健康警告和惩罚性的税。

sense_info_list.en: use deceit or fraud to give something to somebody or to persuade somebody to accept something
sense_info_list.zh: 把(次品等)硬卖给; 以...欺骗

sense_info_list.en: take advantage of someone by demanding their attention or commitment

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>impose</highlight> a penalty on anyone caught littering.
Two and a half centuries on, most countries <highlight>impose</highlight> some sort of tax on alcohol and tobacco.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两个半世纪以来，大多数国家都对烟酒征收某种税。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
